l4/re/util/icu_svr

00003 #pragma once

00005 
00006 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00007 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_stream>
00008 #include <l4/sys/icu>
00009 #include <l4/sys/task>
00010 #include <l4/re/env>
00011 #include <l4/re/util/cap_alloc>
00012 
00013 namespace L4Re { namespace Util {
00014 
00015 template< typename ICU >
00016 class Icu_svr
00017 {
00018 private:
00019   ICU const *this_icu() const { return static_cast<ICU const *>(this); }
00020   ICU *this_icu() { return static_cast<ICU*>(this); }
00021 
00022 public:
00023   int dispatch(l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &iso);
00024 };
00025 
00026 
00027 template<typename ICU>
00028 int
00029 Icu_svr<ICU>::dispatch(l4_umword_t, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00030 {
00031   typedef typename ICU::Irq Irq;
00032   l4_msgtag_t tag;
00033   ios >> tag;
00034   if (tag.label() != L4_PROTO_IRQ)
00035     return -L4_EBADPROTO;
00036 
00037   L4::Opcode op;
00038   ios >> op;
00039   switch (op)
00040     {
00041     case L4_ICU_OP_BIND:
00042       {
00043   l4_umword_t irqnum;
00044   L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage irq_fp;
00045   ios >> irqnum >> irq_fp;
00046   Irq *irq = this_icu()->icu_get_irq(irqnum);
00047   if (!irq)
00048     return -L4_EINVAL;
00049 
00050   return irq->bind(this_icu(), irq_fp);
00051       }
00052     case L4_ICU_OP_UNBIND:
00053       {
00054   l4_umword_t irqnum;
00055   L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage irq_fp;
00056   ios >> irqnum >> irq_fp;
00057   Irq *irq = this_icu()->icu_get_irq(irqnum);
00058   if (!irq)
00059     return -L4_EINVAL;
00060 
00061   return irq->unbind(this_icu(), irq_fp);
00062       }
00063     case L4_ICU_OP_INFO:
00064       {
00065         l4_icu_info_t i;
00066         this_icu()->icu_get_info(&i);
00067         ios << (l4_umword_t)i.features << (l4_umword_t)i.nr_irqs
00068             << (l4_umword_t)i.nr_msis;
00069         return 0;
00070       }
00071     case L4_ICU_OP_MSI_INFO:
00072       {
00073         l4_umword_t msi;
00074         ios >> msi;
00075   Irq *irq = this_icu()->icu_get_irq(msi);
00076   if (!irq)
00077     return -L4_EINVAL;
00078   return irq->msi_info(ios);
00079       }
00080     case L4_ICU_OP_UNMASK:
00081     case L4_ICU_OP_MASK:
00082       {
00083   l4_umword_t irqnum;
00084   ios >> irqnum;
00085   Irq *irq = this_icu()->icu_get_irq(irqnum);
00086   if (irq)
00087     irq->mask(op == L4_ICU_OP_MASK);
00088   return -L4_ENOREPLY;
00089       }
00090     default:
00091       return -L4_ENOSYS;
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 template< typename ICU >
00097 class Icu_cap_array_svr : public Icu_svr<ICU>
00098 {
00099 public:
00100   class Irq
00101   {
00102     public:
00103     Irq() {}
00104 
00105     explicit Irq(L4Re::Util::Auto_cap<L4::Irq>::Cap const &cap)
00106     : _cap(cap) {}
00107 
00108     void trigger() const
00109     { _cap->trigger(); }
00110 
00111     int bind(ICU *, L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage const &irq_fp);
00112     int unbind(ICU *, L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage const &irq_fp);
00113     void mask(bool mask) const
00114     { (void)mask; }
00115 
00116     int msi_info(L4::Ipc::Ostream &) const
00117     { return -L4_EINVAL; }
00118 
00119     L4::Cap<L4::Irq> cap() const { return _cap.get(); }
00120 
00121   private:
00122     L4Re::Util::Auto_cap<L4::Irq>::Cap _cap;
00123   };
00124 
00125 private:
00126   Irq *_irqs;
00127   unsigned _nr_irqs;
00128 
00129 public:
00130 
00131   Icu_cap_array_svr(unsigned nr_irqs, Irq *irqs)
00132   : _irqs(irqs), _nr_irqs(nr_irqs)
00133   {}
00134 
00135   Irq *icu_get_irq(l4_umword_t irqnum)
00136   {
00137     if (irqnum >= _nr_irqs)
00138       return 0;
00139 
00140     return _irqs + irqnum;
00141   }
00142 
00143   void icu_get_info(l4_icu_info_t *inf)
00144   {
00145     inf->features = 0;
00146     inf->nr_irqs = _nr_irqs;
00147     inf->nr_msis = 0;
00148   }
00149 };
00150 
00151 template< typename ICU >
00152 int
00153 Icu_cap_array_svr<ICU>::Irq::bind(ICU *cfb, L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage const &irq_fp)
00154 {
00155   if (!irq_fp.cap_received())
00156     return -L4_EINVAL;
00157 
00158   _cap = L4Re::Util::cap_alloc.alloc<L4::Irq>();
00159   if (!_cap.is_valid())
00160     return -L4_ENOMEM;
00161   _cap.get().move(L4::cap_cast<L4::Irq>(cfb->rcv_cap()));
00162   return 0;
00163 }
00164 
00165 template< typename ICU >
00166 int
00167 Icu_cap_array_svr<ICU>::Irq::unbind(ICU *, L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage const &/*irq_fp*/)
00168 {
00169   L4Re::Env::env()->task()->unmap(_cap.fpage(L4_FPAGE_RWX), L4_FP_ALL_SPACES);
00170   _cap = L4::Cap<L4::Irq>::Invalid;
00171   return 0;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 }}
